channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The U.S. Military Command Plan Needs a Reboot
item.description: The Pentagon’s structural overhaul ought to be matched with the coordination needed to successfully wage large-scale war anywhere.

item.title: Dear Trump, Send In The Troops To Minneapolis Or Risk Losing The Country To Lawlessness
item.description: There is no time this time around for Trump to hem and haw around defiant Democrats. He must initiate a crackdown now.

item.title: Why whatever’s happening in Venezuela isn’t ‘regime change’
item.description: Regime change refers to something far more ambitious and far more consequential than plucking out a single leader.

item.title: Trump shames 5 Republicans who want to restrict him from more military action against Venezuela
item.description: President Trump blasted the five Republican senators who voted Thursday to advance a war powers resolution that would prevent him from taking further ...

item.title: Blue state governor demands private airlines stop providing ICE flights after deadly Minneapolis shooting
item.description: Massachusetts Gov. Maura Healey demanded private airlines stop ICE deportation flights, citing the recent Minneapolis shooting and due process concern...

item.title: I’m the SolarWinds CEO. Here’s why a $4.4 billion move to go private was right for us
item.description: Looking back, the deal succeeded not because we pushed harder or moved faster, but because we stayed balanced.

item.title: Democrats: No One Would Get Shot If We Just Let Them Attack Law Enforcement

item.title: Want to End Shutdowns? Remember the Past and Proceed with Caution
item.description: After last year’s government shutdown, it’s not surprising to see a number of proposals to prevent future shutdowns.

item.title: Google billionaire Larry Page copies the Jeff Bezos playbook, buying a $173 million Miami compound that will save him millions in taxes
item.description: Critics warned a wealth tax in California would lead to a billionaire exodus. Florida says come on in, the water's warm.

item.title: Tim Walz Is a Reckless Menace
item.description: Whether he knows it or not, the Minnesota governor is playing with fire.

item.title: Bessent says Minnesota fraud recovery could help fund Trump’s $1.5T defense plan
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent says Trump's proposed defense spending boost could be funded by recovering money from welfare fraud investigations.

item.title: Experts warn of biggest ‘scandal in litigation system’ if SCOTUS doesn’t nix landmark energy pollution case
item.description: Richard Epstein says Supreme Court must intervene in case that could reshape where massive pollution suits are heard

item.title: Judge rules fifth federal prosecutor unlawfully appointed by Pam Bondi
item.description: The top federal prosecutor in upstate New York is serving in the position unlawfully, a federal judge ruled Thursday.

item.title: Don’t Follow the False Sirens of International Law
item.description: An overly formalistic view of international rules not only hurts America and its allies, but it also creates a more lawless world.

item.title: White House Creates New Assistant Attorney General Position To Go After Fraud
item.description: Vance said the White House decided the best way to streamline anti-fraud efforts was to create a new division at the Department of Justice.

item.title: Don’t Sell Out Pro-Lifers to Save Obamacare
item.description: Being ‘flexible on Hyde’ could mean voting for a grave evil — facilitating the unjust taking of human lives.

item.title: Michael Bloomberg and Warren Buffett agree on advice to Gen Z: Choose vibes over money in your job search
item.description: Bloomberg took a lower salary for his first job out of school because he preferred the people who interviewed him.

item.title: Why Trump’s Venezuela strike may have been about Cuba as much as it was about oil
item.description: Nicolas Maduro’s capture has effectively taken away Cuba’s closest ally.
